metadata.name: Configure SSSD's Memory Cache to Expire
metadata.description:
SSSD's memory cache should be configured to set to expire records after {{{ xccdf_value("var_sssd_memcache_timeout") }}} seconds. To configure SSSD to expire memory cache, set memcache_timeout to {{{ xccdf_value("var_sssd_memcache_timeout") }}} under the [nss] section in /etc/sssd/sssd.conf. For example: 
[nss]
memcache_timeout = {{{ xccdf_value("var_sssd_memcache_timeout") }}}
metadata.rationale:
If cached authentication information is out-of-date, the validity of the
authentication information may be questionable.
